content:
Wonderful to meet you all! As Nick mentioned at the meeting, if there are fields or opportunities that you would like to see the CMS Blue Button FHIR Data Server or its peering partners (BCDA, DPC, etc.) add or update, each program has community managers who are eagerly awaiting your feedback in our Google Groups:

  • Blue Button: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/developer-group-for-cms-blue-button-api
  • BCDA: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/bc-api
  • DPC: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/dpc-api
